abstract.p: Lucent Technologies Inc and Chartered Semiconductor Manufacturing Ltd of Singapore will invest $700 million in next five years in joint effort to develop new semiconductors for next generation of wireless Internet devices (S)

block.p: Lucent Technologies Inc. and Chartered Semiconductor Manufacturing Ltd. of Singapore said yesterday that they would invest $700 million in the next five years in a joint effort to develop new semiconductors for the next generation of wireless Internet devices. Analysts said the tie-up, which joins Lucent's capacity for design with the Singapore company's advantages in manufacturing, was part of an industrywide move toward making more sophisticated and profitable chips.
